---
title: "Statistical analysis of spatial single-cell protein data"
---

This page contains materials for a single-cell spatial proteomics and multiplex imaging data workshop held on January 3, 2024 at the [Pacific Symposium on Biocomputing (PSB)](https://psb.stanford.edu/). For raw materials, go to the [GitHub repository for this website](https://github.com/julia-wrobel/PSB_scProteomics).
